column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health announced this morning that 1 new confirmed case of COVID-19 was reported in Cambodia and 9 more people had been discharged from hospital.------The Ministry of Health notice stated that the new confirmed case was of a 58-year-old Cambodian man who lives in Sihanoukville. He was a staff member at a hotel where the French tour group who were found to be infected stayed.Â ------7 members of that tour group were among the 9 patients who were released after making a full recovery.------The total number of cases detected in Cambodia is now 110
column4: with 34 patients recovered and no deaths.
